t=int(raw_input())

while(t>0):
	x,y=raw_input().split()
	x=int(x)
	y=int(y)
	d=[]
	i=x
	while(1):
		if(i%10==0):
			break;
		d.append(i)
		i=i+1;
	i=y
	while(1):
		if(i%10==9):
			break;
		d.append(i)
		i=i-1;
	s2=0	
	for i in d:
		s=0
		k=i
		while(i>0):
			c=i%10
			if(c%2==0):
				c=c*2
			i=i/10
			s=s+c
	#	print k,s
		s2=s2+(s%10)
	print 45*((y-x-len(d)+1)/10)+s2
	t=t-1;
